alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Dickey; Emmons; Foster; Kidder; La Moure; Logan; McIntosh; Sheridan; Stutsman; Wells (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 12 at 3:42AM CST until December 12 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 6 PM CST THIS EVENING... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, freezing drizzle expected. Total ice accumulations around a light glaze. For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy mixed precipitation expected. Total ice accumulations between one and two tenths of an inch through Tuesday morning, followed by total snow accumulations between 6 and 12 inches Tuesday morning through Thursday morning. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Portions of south central and southeast North Dakota. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, from Noon today to 6 PM CST this evening. For the Winter Storm Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 6 AM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility.
info.instruction: If you have travel plans tonight through Thursday, consider altering or cancelling your plans. If travel is absolutely necessary, be sure to carry a winter survival kit in your vehicle. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
